verses.name: John 6:6
verses.text: And this he said to prove him: for he himself knew what he would do.

verses.name: John 6:7
verses.text: Philip answered him, Two hundred pennyworth of bread is not sufficient for them, that every one of them may take a little.

verses.name: John 6:8
verses.text: One of his disciples, Andrew, Simon Peter’s brother, saith unto him,

verses.name: John 6:9
verses.text: There is a lad here, which hath five barley loaves, and two small fishes: but what are they among so many?

verses.name: John 6:10
verses.text: And Jesus said, Make the men sit down. Now there was much grass in the place. So the men sat down, in number about five thousand.
